Package com.btp.dataStructures.trees

Class RecipeTree

java.lang.Object
com.btp.dataStructures.trees.RecipeTree
public class RecipeTree
extends java.lang.Object
the public class for the SplayTree instances. This code is based in the tutorial found in https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/avl-tree-set-1-insertion/, with major syntax modifications for using generic type nodes and getter/setter methods for data-scope reduction.

      public boolean checkById​(int id)
      Checks if an element is inside the tree. Calls the private constructor method
      Parameters:
      id - The Recipe id to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean true if the element is contained, false if not

    • getElementById

      public Recipe getElementById​(int id)
      Gets a Recipe of the tree using its id. Calls the private getElementById method
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Recipe to be searched
      Returns:
      the Recipe of that respective id

      public Recipe findMin()
      Finds the minimum element in the tree. Calls the recursive method findMin
      Returns:
      the smallest element found

      Returns:
      the biggest element found

      element - the element to be inserted

      public RecipeNode insert​(Recipe element, RecipeNode current)
      Recursive method that inserts a new node in the tree
      Parameters:
      element - the element to be inserted
      current - the current node being compared
      Returns:
      the new TreeNode to be inserted
